name: Dance Dance Panic!
description:
Somewhere in the void a blue bird dances blissfully unaware of the danger that surrounds him. You must protect him for as long as you can

CONTROLS:

Use the Left Analog Stick or Mouse to rotate the shield and protect the dancing bird!

Tag me with your high scores on twitter or post them in the comments below! I wanna see. I'll keep a leaderboard on here if I get enough scores. My high score is 83! Try to beat it!
